front.title: Requirements for Internet Hosts - Communication Layers

abstract.t: This RFC is an official specification for the Internet community. It incorporates by reference, amends, corrects, and supplements the primary protocol standards documents relating to hosts. [STANDARDS-TRACK]

front.title: Requirements for Internet Hosts - Application and Support

abstract.t: This RFC is an official specification for the Internet community. It incorporates by reference, amends, corrects, and supplements the primary protocol standards documents relating to hosts. [STANDARDS-TRACK]
